website_summaries.verdict: The Asus ZenBook UX305CA is a well-made midrange ultraportable with an aluminum body, a full HD touch screen, good performance, and plenty of features at a very affordable price.
pros: Solid performance on our benchmark tests

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic piece of kit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 128GB SSD version and am not disappointed. It is a very thin and surprisingly sturdy notebook with an incredible screen. One thing to note is that because of the incredible screen the battery can take a bit of a hit but I find that using the notebook for the processes that it is designed to handle such as word processing and browsing the internet the battery life is more than acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Magnus

customer_reviews.title: Great ultrabook for it's cost - would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's simply unbeatable. I'm not sure if the negative reviews here are referring to the same model, but it's sleek and well built and surprisingly fast for such modest hardware. I use it for programming, and although it clearly doesn't compare to my i7 PC, it's absolutely fine for compiling code, running VM's etc. Would definitely recommend. Great battery life too. There is one con - the audio quality. Very tinny and quiet, however this rarely effects me as I don't use it for it's audio capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Check out the screen quality before buying this laptop!
customer_reviews.text: This great and light laptop tick all the boxes for what I was looking for with a solid case and fast processor. I read about the absence of keyboard back light as an issue, I personally don't find find this a disadvantage and the typing is clear and fast in any condition unless you work in the dark. The battery last long and overall I am quite happy with this purchase. However I didn't gave five stars because my old laptop (Samsung X420) had a better screen despite been built six years ago and with a lower pixels available.
customer_reviews.author: Seb

customer_reviews.title: Excelent Zen
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine, fast and economic on battery. Only one issue that may be with Windows 10 v. Intel Engine Driver; this stops the machine powering up from Sleep or Hibernation Mode. I have rolled back to an earlier version of the driver but ths hasn't fully solved the issue. From blogs this is not solely an ASUS issue. I hope Microsoft and Intel are listening to these comments and get their acts together soon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amaz Addict

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed in this laptop
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in this laptop. At first, it seemed perfect - lightweight with a great keyboard and excellent screen quality. It was ideal for use of Office 365 and general internet usage, which is all I really want from a laptop. However, after five months of use, the laptop kept freezing. The system was restored once with files, and the second time to factory settings, yet the problem persisted. I had been very careful with the laptop, and am therefore very frustrated. I am currently waiting to see if ASUS will repair or replace it. In hindsight, I should have spent more, and bought a MacBook...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: some glitches with this machine - screen quality not perfect and sometimes screen just blanks out
customer_reviews.text: some glitches with this machine - screen quality not perfect and sometimes screen just blanks out. I have backed up everything just in case I can't retrieve my data again.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Anthony O. Agbobu

customer_reviews.title: It is a good laptop for 600 euros
customer_reviews.text: I have it for a year now. It is a good laptop for 600 euros . It is very light and easy to carried, very nice display, never get hot and the battery is for 5 hours almost. Disadvantages: NO HDMI, every time that there is an update for Windows the touchpad is useless and you have to download the drivers again(I hate it). Also the sound is not loud at all comparing to other laptops.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... well and the processor speed is as expected (not great..
customer_reviews.text: Google chrome doesn't seem to want to work very well and the processor speed is as expected (not great...). However, overall it's a good product - good build quality and good battery life for a reasonable price. Additionally, very lightweight and it came with a nice pocket/sleeve which will make it easier to transport in my bag. If you want a power house of a computer then this won't be for you, however for everyday uses it seems decent (for now).
customer_reviews.author: Amanda. O

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very small, sleek, elegant and yet still powerful. The display is great. Key travel and comfort is very good. The battery life is also excellent. I'm very pleased with this purchase and would happily use it for work if I needed to (I work as an IT manager).
customer_reviews.author: AndrewS Hampshire

customer_reviews.title: Overall performance is great for the price and form factor
customer_reviews.text: Light, thin and definitely catches an eye or two! Being a tech enthusiast and owning a powerful rig at home, this is solely used for college work. Overall performance is great for the price and form factor, handling every task that needs to be done for college with ease. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: the PC is fantastic, as a student and for a daily commuting ...
customer_reviews.text: the PC is fantastic, as a student and for a daily commuting and work on uni assignments the PC does more than its job. screen is fantastic. resolution makes the differences. im glad a bought the UHD instead of the previous 1080p. track pad works perfectly i assume asus fixed the problem in this gen. although the accuracy could be better. isnt bad but i have tried better... tru is in the end this is better than mackbok air and costs 3x less. thumbs up to asus
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and slow
customer_reviews.text: Very decent, lightweight, but poor performance, glorified chromebook, but does the job very well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Maunder

customer_reviews.title: Great machine I love it
customer_reviews.text: Great machine I love it, it's so light and the screen is amazingly crisp and clear it's very fast and responsive no lag boots in seconds and looks sexy too, all in all an excellent product 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Jimathome

customer_reviews.title: It really is an amazing laptop with great graphics that compete with most current ...
customer_reviews.text: It really is an amazing laptop with great graphics that compete with most current macbooks (retina display) and at a vary superior price range, smaller than a macbook, better graphics, 5-7 hour battery life, and portable
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek beauty!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and fast, sleek, lightweight, and good screen. A couple of quibbles: the display driver keeps crashing when I have more than a few tabs open in my internet browsers (the screen freezes briefly and then relaunches webpages - it only takes a few seconds, but is irritating); and the screen lid doesn't open very wide, so makes it sub-optimal to use on when it's actually on your lap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coil whine
customer_reviews.text: Terrible coil whine on both my original purchaser and the replacement I ordered. Oddly enough both units only had coil whine during day to day tasks. When stress testing on Prime95 the coil whine was almost inaudible. However, I can't be expected to keep Prime95 running none stop just to prevent my ears bleeding
customer_reviews.author: O DAE

customer_reviews.title: Very nice computer. Very fast
customer_reviews.text: Very nice computer. Very fast, light and looks great. For this price it is def just as good as the far more expensive alternatives for the specs that you are getting. I've had this computer for just over a month and have had no problems. Battery life is very good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shortly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent notebook
customer_reviews.text: Excellent notebook. Lightweight and fast to load. Good resolution. Responsive. Good for streaming. Excellent for college or university use. Recommend. Good battery life. Quick to charge.
customer_reviews.author: H. Morton

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased generally with this computer
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased generally with this computer. It is fast, lightweight and even comes with a case. Battery power seems good and screen resolution is sharp and clear. The only problems I have come across are to do with sizing on some websites and when setting up my e-mail accounts in Outlook where it does not display the full page without universally reducing the font size. Otherwise a great product.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: she told it was all good.
customer_reviews.text: It was for my friend and she did not complain about it, she told it was all good.
customer_reviews.author: Vytautas Liesis

customer_reviews.title: Liked the last one so much, we came back for more.
customer_reviews.text: Slim, light, powerful, awesome battery life - a great laptop, and now the second one in the family
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hubby very happy n impress with it, very light n slim, fast as well
customer_reviews.author: Ellaine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ultra slim and fast browsing very very portable ver happy
customer_reviews.author: Pierre FAYE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter find this very easy to use and it is quick. value for money
customer_reviews.author: Angelab

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: after 6 moths of using it my ssd just failed...very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a techy review.
customer_reviews.text: Not going to write a lengthy techy review, just to say I am VERY happy with the Zenbook, it looks and feels great, does everything I wanted and has a cracking display. It boots up like lightning and as I anticipated it is perfectly fine for normal work, emails and browsing. Forget any heavy graphics or CAD program, but this isn't what I bought it for. Thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: trekker

customer_reviews.title: Good hardware, pity about the software.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hardware good screen, nice keyboard and better track pad than many. The bundled software was unwelcome. Would much prefer just the OS and drivers and then carefully install the software I want. Had to uninstall unwanted software and somewhere somehow a browser hijacker got in. This required two pieces of malware removal software and some manual removal to get rid of it. For someone less confident with computers who just wants to use it out of the box this would not be good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent netbook with a poor touch pad!
customer_reviews.text: I got this laptop on Saturday as a gift and I'm disappointed with the visible marks in the keyboard. The netbook is well packed so I'm surprised how these marks are possible ? Only the seller and Amazon can explain? The netbook itself seems good apart from the touch pad. I should have read the reviews before, in my opinion it is an appalling design. For the price I would expect a decent touch pad.I did buy a mouse as I found it very frustrating. I would definitely insist anyone who wants to buy this model to try the touch pad in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Sathish Selliah

customer_reviews.title: Nice laptop, slowed down by pre-installed bloatware
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking laptop with good specification, at a competitive price. However, unfortunately it works very slow due to lots of pre-installed bloatware. If it wasn't for the performance issue, I would rate it 4, or even 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Operator
customer_reviews.text: Using this laptop 2 days now and I am impressed. It runs smooth and it is extremely light. The overall physical design of the laptop is quiet. I have being using it with google cast to my TV and it gives excellent HD quality video. Only flaws I can find is the touchpad isn't the best, the internal memory is low at 128 GB but that is stated in the description and not having a HDMI input is a little annoying. That being said, all these problems can be replaced with an external harddrive, a mouse and a HDMI to micro HDMI cable. Overall, I am very content with this product.
customer_reviews.author: keith glynn

customer_reviews.title: Very good laptop
customer_reviews.text: Very good laptop. It's the faster laptob that I've ever had. Furthermore is very slim and light. The only problem is that it only has 128Gb of memory.
customer_reviews.author: Trinitario

customer_reviews.title: I loved this, but it kept randomly dropping my internet ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this, but it kept randomly dropping my internet connection and I (and tech support) could never figure out why. I had to return it in the end and get something else, which was a shame because it seemed brilliant other than that one thing
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: I bought it to write my master's dissertation and it stopped working in the worst moment for me
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is dead after being carefully used for less than 3 months. It does not turn on any more. I bought it to write my master's dissertation and it stopped working in the worst moment for me. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: manuel gonzalez gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like the lap top but the volume is terrible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent notebook, unbeliveably fast, at least for me. Antiglare screen allows outdoor usage, battery lasts the advertised 4 hours. Windows 10 is quite a pain, but it has nothing to do with the product itself. Update. Do not buy. I've to change the "Finely-detailed QHD+ display" and find out production has been discontinued. In other words, there's no replacement screen unless you buy it from Asus directly for some 350 Euro.
customer_reviews.author: GenoDutch

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed because I've read lots of great reviews for this ...
customer_reviews.text: This arrived yesterday and I'm already having problems. The screen keeps flickering and the display driver keeps failing so I updated it but that didn't solve the problem. I called Asus who told me to get in touch with the retailer, Amazon in this case; I then called Amazon, who told me they were unable to replace the item as it comes from a third party seller. I'm disappointed because I've read lots of great reviews for this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Its a great laptop. It runs so fast and is unbelievably ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a great laptop. It runs so fast and is unbelievably light. Its great for doing work on and is the perfect size, it also looks ace and feels great. Only downside I would give is, its a bit cold after using it for a few hours because of the metal top
customer_reviews.author: Reece C

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the best laptop, a bit annoying and difficult to use the mouse and keyboard on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is designed to overwrite any access to software I already ...
customer_reviews.text: Is designed to overwrite any access to software I already own so that I have to buy forcibly a new driver for my printer, a 365 version of Outlook, etc. Too invasive, and entirely out of order.
customer_reviews.author: Claude St Arroman

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Good overall, but specs should be better for the price, and loudspeakers are too low in the volume of sound produced
customer_reviews.author: Paul Caruana

customer_reviews.title: Not necessarily Asus to blame but have reset twice. ...
customer_reviews.text: Not necessarily Asus to blame but have reset twice. The last time Windows had a decent operating system was the Millennium Edition. This will be the last laptop powered by Windows that I buy. UPDATE: Cannot read a USB dongle but every other device does. Device detection and bluetooth connection is pathetic DO NOT BUY THIS JUNK. IT MAKES A PERFECT TARGET FOR A 4 POUND HAMMER
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother buying this laptop - spend a little more and get a macbook pro
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother buying this laptop - spend a little more and get a macbook pro. It may take a few days to get used to a mac but it's worth it in the end!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mitchell

product_meta.title: Black - Intel Core M3-6Y30 8GB 128GB SSD Intel HD 515 Integrated Graphics No-ODD 13.3 INCH QHD Win 10

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars70 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
